trans-unit.source: Receives status information about a build from the <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager" /> 物件接收關於組建的狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManagerCallback> object can be passed to the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager> object through the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.PrecompileApplication%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManagerCallback>物件可以傳遞至<xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager>物件透過<xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.PrecompileApplication%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: When an error is encountered during an application build, the error is passed as an argument to either the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManagerCallback.ReportCompilerError%2A> or the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManagerCallback.ReportParseError%2A> method, depending on the type of error.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式建置期間發生錯誤時，錯誤會做為引數傳遞至<xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManagerCallback.ReportCompilerError%2A>或<xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManagerCallback.ReportParseError%2A>方法，視錯誤類型而定。

trans-unit.source: When you create a class that derives from the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManagerCallback> class, you can implement these methods and retrieve the error.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立的類別，衍生自<xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManagerCallback>類別，您可以實作這些方法，並擷取錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManagerCallback" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManagerCallback" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Returns a lifetime service object that can be used to control the lifetime policy for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 傳回存留期服務物件，這個物件可用來控制此執行個體的存留期原則。

trans-unit.source: The error or warning encountered during compilation.
trans-unit.target: 在編譯期間遇到的錯誤或警告。

trans-unit.source: Reports compilation errors and warnings that occur during an application build.
trans-unit.target: 報告在應用程式組建期間發生的編譯錯誤和警告。

trans-unit.source: The error or warning encountered during parsing.
trans-unit.target: 在剖析期間遇到的錯誤或警告。

trans-unit.source: Reports parsing errors and warnings that occur during an application build.
trans-unit.target: 報告在應用程式組建期間發生的剖析錯誤和警告。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> containing the current status of the build.
Reports the progress of an application build.
trans-unit.target: 報告應用程式組建的進度。
